name: Mahjong 3D Pro Unlimited Games
description:
- Clear 3D graphics? Ticked
- Easy to watch, easy to play? Ticked
- Pleasant palette of colours carefully selected to give you the best comfort when playing?Ticked
We have ticked all the boxes, you match all the tiles!

-No Wi-Fi required when playing-

You will love it.The new 3D technology represents the next generation of Mah jongg Solitaire board game. This truly 3D engine will lead you through a world of highly addictive unlimited levels. Challenge yourself and have fun matching all the Majong tiles on the screen with this 'State of the Art' brain training.

Entertain yourself and keep your brain in good shape with four progressively difficult game modes:
- Learn how to play with the Warm-up Mode
- Just relax and no pressure in Medium Mode
- Improve your strategy skills with the 'made for Mahjong Masters' Difficult Mode
- Become a Supreme Master by playing the Extreme mode

Features

- 3D technology
- Zoom in, zoom out
- Full rotation and double tap
- HD Graphics
- Unlimited levels
- Hint gift in each level
- Shuffle board options
- Undo function
- Timer
- Pause game
